subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort in Rajasthan was built by Maharaja Mansingh?
question_hi: राजस्थान में महाराजा माहंसिंग ने किस महत्वपूर्ण कठोरणा की बनाई।
explanation_en: Amber Fort was built by Maharaja Mansingh.
explanation_hi: आमरणवाड़ा, Maharaja Mansingh ki tarah बनाया गया है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Rathore king to rule Rajasthan?
question_hi: राजस्थान के पहले राजोद्र ने राजस्थान को नेत्रत क्या स्वती?
explanation_en: Udai Singh was the first Rathore king to rule Rajasthan.
explanation_hi: उदाई सिंग राजरों ने राजस्थान को नेत्रत करनेवाला है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Jodhpur State?
question_hi: जोधपुर राज्य के संतरांगों के संतरांग अम्बर से बनी है।
explanation_en: Rao Jodhmal was the founder of Jodhpur State.
explanation_hi: राव जोधमाल जोधपुर स्तंग के बने है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the founder of Meena Bazar in Jaipur?
question_hi: जापुर मेना बाज़ार के बने हुए सतंग
explanation_en: Rao Jodhmal was the founder of Meena Bazaar in Jaipur.
explanation_hi: राव जोधमाल जापुर मेवार बाजार के बाजार के सतंग

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which Rana ruled Rajasthan during the Mughal period?
explanation_en: Rana Pratap Singh was the Rana who ruled Rajasthan during the Mughal period.

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which queen was known as the 'Rani of Jaisam', in the era of Mughal?
explanation_en: Jaisam era mein Mewar mein Maharaja Kumbha ne Rajasthan mein Kumbha jaisa kisi maharaja ki Rani ka naam Mewa

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Who was the first Sardar of Bikanakhera?
explanation_en: During the reign of Maharaja Kumbha, Bikanakhera ka sardar ka naam Rao Kishori
